sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>wf_activity</document><document_key>c3af4e6b6f176a0067a8c8c17c3ee418</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-12-01 06:42:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>cbaf4e6b6f176a0067a8c8c17c3ee418</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-01 06:42:02</sys_updated_on><value>/*

  Package Description
  
  Artifact : Script Include
  Method   : createOpportunityFromContract
  Params   : 1 - Contract, 2-Opportunity Contract Type
  
  if Contract.Type = App Store then
     Opportunity Contract Type = App Store Customer Renewal
  else if Contract.Type = App Store TPP then
     Opportunity Contract Type = App Store Vendor Renewal
  else
     Opportunity Contract Type = Renewal	 
  

*/</value><variable display_value="">6f593faa4f9b2a004172fc728110c78d</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_cc033fdf4f976a004172fc728110c7bd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.TechnicalDocumentUtil</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TechnicalDocumentUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var TechnicalDocumentUtil = Class.create();
TechnicalDocumentUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	startWorkflow: function() {
		var wfId = this.getParameter('sysparm_wf');
		var wfAPI = new Workflow();
		var context = wfAPI.startFlow(wfId);
		return context.sys_id;
	},
	workFlowChange: function() {
		var result = false;
		var useCaseId = this.getParameter('sysparm_usecase_id');
		var wfCtxId = this.getParameter('sysparm_ctx_id');
		var step = this.getParameter('sysparm_step');		
		gs.info('**** workFlowChange : params = ' + useCaseId + '::' + wfCtxId + '::' + step);
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_techdoc_usecases');
		gr.get(useCaseId);
		gs.info('**** workFlowChange : usecase = ' + gr.getRowCount());
		if(gr.isValidRecord()){
			gs.info('**** workFlowChange : step = ' + step);			
			var steps = gr.step2nextevent.split(',');
			gs.info('**** workFlowChange : steps = ' + steps);
			for(var indx=0;indx<steps.length;indx++) {
				gs.info('**** workFlowChange : steps[indx] = ' + steps[indx]);
				if(steps[indx] == step) {
					var w = new Workflow();
					var ctxGr = new GlideRecord('wf_context');
					ctxGr.get(wfCtxId);
					gs.info('**** workFlowChange : ctx = ' + ctxGr.scratchpad.next);
					gs.setProperty(ctxGr.scratchpad.next, 'true');
					gs.info('**** workFlowChange : set property');
					w.broadcastEvent(wfCtxId, 'update');
					gs.info('**** workFlowChange : result = true');
					result = true;
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		return result;
	},
	
	popMessages: function() {
		var result = '';
		var useCaseId = this.getParameter('sysparm_usecase_id');
		var wfCtxId = this.getParameter('sysparm_ctx_id');
		var step = this.getParameter('sysparm_step');		
		gs.info('**** workFlowChange : params = ' + useCaseId + '::' + wfCtxId + '::' + step);
		var ctxGr = new GlideRecord('wf_context');
		ctxGr.get(wfCtxId);
		result = JSON.stringify(ctxGr.scratchpad.messages);
		ctxGr.scratchpad.messages = [];
		var w = new Workflow();
		w.broadcastEvent(wfCtxId, 'update');
		return result;
	},
	type: 'TechnicalDocumentUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-30 19:18:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cc033fdf4f976a004172fc728110c7bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TechnicalDocumentUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cc033fdf4f976a004172fc728110c7bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-12-05 04:06:02</sys_updated_on><u_orig_script/></sys_script_include></record_update>
